tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor has prescribed medicine to delay periods. video call was for 5 minutes and the doctor hung up. Was requesting what side effects to expect from the medicine, etc., in the call and on chat, no response was provided. Just sent prescription and logged out.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
In all hospitals, inserting the vaginal pessary, that too, for a 75+ year old senior citizen, is covered within the consultation fee since it is a simple medical procedure.

During consultation, it appears that Dr.Meenakshi Kamath was heavily pressurizing my mother to undergo hysterectomy, the surgical procedure.

My 81 year old father too was present there.

My mother, a chronic diabetic & with other ailments, a retired LIC of India Employee, having already seen the serious side-effects of hysterectomy in her colleague and others, firmly said NO to Dr.Meenakshi Kamath.

Later, the hospital executive went in and met Dr.Meenakshi Kamath and she wrote ₹2500 for the pessary insertion.

In all hospitals, the charge, even when separately charged and not made part of consultation, for pessary insertion, is ₹500 to ₹1000 max.

But here, consultation which was purely for pessary insertion, was already charged.

In addition, was this ₹2500/-

Totally, *** * ****** ******* ********** ******* *** ***** **** ** **** *******

This is totally disappointing, especially since we saw cloudnine on the internet and decided to visit cloudnine.

**PLEASE DISCONTINUE SERVICES OF Dr.MEENAKSHI KAMATH Immediately.***** ***** ** ** ************* *** **** ********* ******* ************* *** **** *** *** *** ********* ** *********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am very fortunate that I consulted Dr. Meenakshi Kamath in the month of June 2020 and within a year I was blessed with a very handsome baby boy whom I gave birth to on 22nd June 2021.  

Dr. Kamath is extremely passionate and dedicated about her work and is a thorough professional, who gives equal attention to both (to be) Parents and listens to their approach towards parenthood. 
Apart from being friendly and strict at the same time, she is always available to her patients on phone calls or on whatsapp, and responds promptly to query time to time to her patients through messages.

 She is one such doctor who insists on normal delivery who are really hard to find in these days( I really have to tell this: During my last few minutes in labour, I was never confident of delivering the baby "normal" , I was feeling really tired and felt it's not possible as the entire labour and pain took for 3-4 hours long and the pain was excruciating( Felt Like beating up everyone then who ever was in front of me , Just Kidding),  Honestly the Labour pain is in next level and unexplainable, but thanks to Dr. Meenakshi Kamath who arrived on time and gave me the courage & confidence that I have to and can deliver "normal"  at that end moment her confidence had really helped in pushing and the baby was finally "out" in 15min.. I was actually surprised at myself that I could finally do it. 

My Husband and I can't thank her enough for motivating me throughout my pregnancy journey. 

Finally I would like to say the entire experience of my pregnancy and delivery went really smooth because of Dr. Meenakshi Kamath. 

I strongly recommend Dr. Meenakshi Kamath to everyone who is looking for doctors who are giving correct treatment as required for the patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Hi folks,

Myself kishore and Vasavi , we have met this doctor after the miscarriage of the first baby in Krishna seva srama by Dr. Pradeepa.

I had much more confidence in Dr. Meenakshi kamath because I know this doctor from my school days because she is a senior specialist in shekhar hospital since very long years.

We had pre and post pregnancy planning successful done by Dr. Meenakshi kamath 

We blessed with a healthy baby girl with healthy mother only because of the protocol and advice, treatment and support given by madam.

My heartfelt thanks to Meenakshi Madam for making a new endeavour in my life & we cannot forget you lifetime.

Please note for general public. In simple words you are 1000% in safe hands with Dr.Meenakshi kamath always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I would like to thank doctor Meenakshi from the bottom of my heart for being such a strong tuff doctor and a friend. She has been with me throughout my pregnancy like a guardian angel one call msg away. She was true guide and tuff person when it comes to enforcing practices if I dint follow.. but a great friend whom I could confide in with all my health issues which she used to resolve immediately. I must say she is a brilliant doctor whom I would recommend to all for her service and skills. Thankyou doctor for being there for me and my family and help us have a happy healthy baby boy. We are eternally very grateful to you.
reply_text: Thanks Anita... your appreciation is my strength

tags: Wait time,
context: Labor and Delivery,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
We visited Dr. Kamath for pregnancy and the birth of our child. This was our first child and needless to say we have had a lot of questions throughout the journey. 
But Dr. Kamath made the journey so smooth. *** ** ********* ************** ******** *** ******** She kept an open line of communication throughout the journey. I noticed that she also keeps her team on their toes, although the hospital's admin team needs to do better. She is very hands on in the care she provides and will put her best effort to try for a normally delivery. As overwhelming as this journey can get, it helps to have someone with her set of skills by your side. We had a wonderful holistic experience with her and would definitely recommend her. Thank you Doctor for delivering our baby.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Exercise,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I had a great experience with Dr. Meenakshi doctor. I was worried about my pregnancy because I was in "risky pregnancy". She treated with care and filled with positive energy and I am happy with her treatment. She is go to person anytime. Even if we delay appointment time, she waited for us in her busy schedule, thank you so much doctor, I would recommend 100% for others too.
reply_text: Thanks Shilpakala!You were one of the most obedient patients I ever had...you were so good at managing your diabetes.. God bless you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am writing this while I sit beside my 6 month old darling daughter.Dr Meenakshi is an amazing doctor with a very cool attitude. Her response is amazing and she was just a call away during my entire pregnancy.Her style of treatment , medication and accommodativeness makes her even more special and most commendable doctor.We wish her good luck in her career and thank her from the bottom of our heart for making the whole journey easy and memorable one. Kudos to Dr. Meenakshi !
reply_text: Thanks Padmaja.. your appreciation means so much to me

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Meenakshi has been very supportive and helpful from the very beginning when I visited her. She has always been very frank and straightforward in her approach and that gave me so much confidence. She made sure that I will have the best possible treatment and also the most safe experience especially during this pandemic time. I always ended up happy and relaxed after every consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Extremely grateful for the constant support and guidance I received from doctor Meenakshi throughout my entire pregnancy. She was always reachable through call / WhatsApp guiding us whenever we had doubts . Extremely positive , always ready to clear all questions you have . Delivered a healthy baby boy with minimal intervention. Forever thankful!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),Labor and Delivery,Anesthesia,
review: Had a wonderful experience with Dr.Meenakshi. She diagnosed hypertension and gestational diabetes around 26th week and treated me with well care and medication. She always advised me how to monitor and take care of my health. Delivered baby via c-section. I definitely recommend Dr.Meenakshi. She is very friendly and was very comfortable throughout my pregnancy visits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Meenakshi is an amazing doctor with a very friendly attitude. She is always a call away to clear any doubts, She provides simple solutions to all our queries and suggests/advises proper treatment. It is because of her I had a smooth pregnancy and delivered my baby without any complications.

I would like to thank Meenakshi ma’am for making this journey a beautiful one

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Horrible. My wife went to this doctorInstead of helping her and listening to the query, the Doctor said you are fat.. and why are you thinking of pregnancy ? She scolded her literally. Doctor did not helped her at all and my wife was crying from inside after meeting her. Please do not go to this Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We went to Dr. Meenakshi mam for treatment of my sister who was suffering from horrible pain during periods. after scans and all she explained about the condition and suggested for a surgery immediately..from that moment she was in touch with us personally and explained things and Laproscopy Surgery was done successfully. good care was taken in Shekhar hospital by the sisters..Till discharge and after that during follow up visit Meenakshi mam was so positive in her approach that even patients feel at ease and overcome their fears. Thank you mam for every thing.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was satisfactory. She explained the problem in detail. Have to come back for follow up check up again but as of today, I am satisfied.

review: Dr. Meenakshi Kamath bold, experienced and most energetic doctor i have met, from 3rd month of my twin pregnancy to my 9th month of delivery she answered all my queries through appointment, phone and whatsapp. I am very grateful to her for wonderful journey of my motherhood of my twin babies. I pray for God for all the good things in life for her. thank you Doctor.

review: My experience with Doctor Meenakshi has been extremely wonderful! Her constant support, guidance, friendliness has got me through these months easily. Inspite of the current pandemic, she has been there through the whole process until delivery and even now.I thank Doctor Meenakshi wholeheartedly!

Thus saving the baby's life. She had delivered my first baby via c- section and even today other doctors admire her stitch work. Her hands are truly blessed .
